overview: The Spanish Dancer is the story of Maritana, a gypsy girl who dances in courtyards and even tells people's fortunes. Despite her gypsy occupation, Maritana wishes to be a Countess. Her ambitions are realized when she meets the handsome Count Don Cesar de Baz√°n, if only the King of Spain would stay out of their way!
tagline: And now the perfect combination- the Negri of foreign-made triumphs in an American-produced super picture.
title: The Spanish Dancer
